articles.title: KNPC Spokesman Calls for Foiling U.S. Nuclear War Moves
articles.content:
KNPC Spokesman Calls for Foiling U.S. Nuclear War Moves
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Korean National Peace Committee issued a statement on Sunday with the approach of 60 years since the U.S. officially published the introduction of nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					 The U.S. officially announced the above-said introduction on January 29, 1958 and undisguisedly opened to public nukes including atomic guns and Honest John nuclear missiles, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Thenceforth the Korean Peninsula, once a nuclear free zone, has turned into a nuclear powder magazine and a source of nuclear war of the U.S. and the Korean nation has been at constant peril of nuclear war due to its nuclear stick.
					
					 Even at this time when the climate of national concord, unity and detente is growing strong on the Korean Peninsula thanks to our proactive measures and sincere efforts, the U.S. is bringing nuclear carrier task forces, nuclear strategic bombers and other huge nuclear war means to south Korea and its vicinity, imposing constant nuclear war threat and blackmail on our nation.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the U.S. is planning to designate the DPRK as "potential state of nuclear threat" and stipulate even the scenario for preemptive nuclear strike in the "2018 nuclear posture review report" to be published around early February.
					
					 The past sixty years are a history of heinous aggression and crimes in which the U.S. reduced south Korea into the world's biggest nuclear weapons arsenal and most dangerous seat of nuclear war and has constantly threatened the destiny of the Korean nation with nukes.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to behave itself, aware that the days have gone for good when it could pose its unilateral threat to the DPRK with a nuclear stick.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop the shipment of U.S. nuclear strategic assets and aggressor forces which will spawn bloodshed on this sacred territory, cease the nuclear war exercises with the U.S. and respond to our sincere efforts for detente.
					
					 All compatriots in the north and the south and abroad should reject the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. to bring clouds of a nuclear war to hang over Korea, and conduct more vigorous anti-U.S., anti-war struggle to drive the U.S. nuclear hardware and aggression forces out of south Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Arch Criminal Harassing Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Arch Criminal Harassing Peace
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article cites facts to expose that the United States is the arch criminal harassing peace as it has spawned political confusion, conflict and bloodshed by sowing discord and antagonism among other countries and regions,
					 The U.S. is the harasser of peace as it has constantly exacerbated the situation on the Korean Peninsula through military provocations and war threat, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Peaceful climate was urgently needed for the DPRK which suffered serious damage from the war imposed by the U.S. in the 1950s and rose from the debris.
					
					 However, only vicious cycle of mounting tension has prevailed on the Korean Peninsula for the past several decades.
					
					 Nuclear war drills have persisted to drive the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula has turned into the biggest hotspot of the world owing to the U.S. reckless military threat and blackmail.
					
					 The reality proves once again the truth that it is necessary to stand up with force of justice only against the imperialist aggressors keen to disturb the world peace and security and impose a nuclear disaster upon humankind.
					
					 As a responsible nuclear power, the DPRK will resolutely smash any act of harassing peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Smashing Challenge of Separatist Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Smashing Challenge of Separatist Forces
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article cites facts to disclose that the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries and the south Korean confrontational maniacs opposed to reunification are going so reckless as to chill the climate of detente on the Korean Peninsula, being created by the proactive and sincere efforts of the DPRK, and thus realize their sinister ambition.
					 The article says:
					
					 As the DPRK exerts sincere efforts to improve the north-south relations, the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad are getting more pronounced in the moves to stem the trend of the times and realize their ambition for stifling the former.
					
					 It is the desire of the compatriots and demand of the times to mend the inter-Korean relations and bring about a signal turn in reunifying the country independently.
					
					 The present reality of the north-south relations clearly proves the validity and vitality of the DPRK's fresh policy for improving the relations.
					
					 It is a fruition of the above-said policy that dialogue, contact and exchange between the north and the south of Korea started, though they had remained frozen for a long time owing to the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad, and climate of detente was created on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The north and the south should pave a broad avenue to their improved relations which made a good start despite the difficult situation.
					
					 The Korean nation is greatly angered by the reckless moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad to incite confrontation while going against the trend of the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should dynamically pave the road of national reunification under the uplifted banner of national independence while resolutely smashing with their concerted efforts the criminal moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad to check the improvement of the north-south relations and realize their ambition for stifling the DPRK.

articles.title: School Part-Time Workers Go on Strike in S. Korea
articles.content:
School Part-Time Workers Go on Strike in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo, the headquarters of government employees in education under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference outside Chongwadae on Jan. 24 to urge the "government" to repeal the part-time jobs and launched a sit-in-strike.
					 A press release was read out.
					
					 The release urged Chongwadae to properly turn school part-time jobs into full-time jobs and settle the plight of those dismissed part-time workers.
					
					 It stressed that the "government" should come out to prevent massive dismissal in the future, and declared the start of outdoor sit-in-strike.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Belarus
yongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Belarus on Jan. 16.
					 L. Shukolinikov, chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits and organize such colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Finland
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Finland
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Helsinki, Finland on January 16.
					 Juha Kieksi, international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange various political and cultural events such as meeting, book and photo exhibition and film show on the anniversary.

articles.title: CNCDP llama a frustrar con fuerzas unidas las tentativas de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
CNCDP llama a frustrar con fuerzas unidas las tentativas de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que pasaron 60 anos desde cuando EE.UU. anuncio en publico la introduccion de armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica el dia 28 una declaracion que va en particular:
					El 29 de enero de 1958, anuncio oficialmente la introduccion de armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea, y despues, dio a la publicidad el canon atomico, el misil nuclear Honest John y otros armamentos ya emplazados. 
					
					Desde entonces la Peninsula Coreana, que era una zona desnuclearizada, se ha convertido en el arsenal nuclear de EE.UU. y foco de la guerra nuclear, y la nacion coreana se ve amenazada gravemente por el peligro de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. 
					
					En estos tiempos se eleva en la Peninsula Coreana el clima favorable a la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y al alivio de la tension gracias a la iniciativa y los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC. 
					
					En contraste, EE.UU. traslada al Sur de Corea y su contorno las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares, los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares y otros enormes pertrechos de guerra nuclear ejerciendo incesantemente la amenaza y chantaje de guerra nuclear sobre la nacion coreana.
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que en el "reporte de revision del estado nuclear de 2018", que se publicara a principios de febrero, definira a la RPDC como "amenazador nuclear latente" e incluira el ataque preventivo nuclear contra esta. 
					
					Los 60 anos transcurridos devienen la historia abominable de agresion y crimenes en que EE.UU. ha convertido el suelo surcoreano en el mayor arsenal nuclear del mundo y foco de la guerra nuclear y amenaza con arma nuclear el destino de la nacion coreana.
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que ya paso por completo la era en que con el garrote nuclear amenazaba unilateralmente a su rival socialista.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben introducir las propiedades estrategicas nucleares y otras fuerzas armadas de EE.UU., sino dejar los ejercicios conjuntos de guerra nuclear con EE.UU. y sumarse a los esfuerzos sinceros de la parte connacional por el alivio de la tension.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben dinamizar mas la lucha antiyanqui y antibelica para rechazar las maniobras de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y expulsar del suelo surcoreano los pertrechos de guerra nuclear y los uniformados norteamericanos.
